# Define source files
file (GLOB_RECURSE SOURCE_FILES *.h *.cpp)
set (SOURCE_FILES ${SOURCE_FILES})
add_library (JoltPhysics STATIC ${SOURCE_FILES})
target_include_directories(JoltPhysics SYSTEM
    PUBLIC $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Jolt>
           $<BUILD_INTERFACE:${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}>
           $<INSTALL_INTERFACE:${DEST_THIRDPARTY_HEADERS_DIR}/Jolt>
)

install(DIRECTORY JoltPhysics DESTINATION ${DEST_THIRDPARTY_HEADERS_DIR} FILES_MATCHING PATTERN *.h)
if (NOT URHO3D_MERGE_STATIC_LIBS)
    install(TARGETS JoltPhysics EXPORT Urho3D ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${DEST_ARCHIVE_DIR_CONFIG})
endif ()
